column1: Little Goat Diner////This place was amazing!!! We went for my husband bday. The server was on point with his recommendation for food. For starters we had the sweet potato bread yum. Then we had the goat empanadas! Delicious!!! Then we have the goat ribs!! Omg fall off the bone yum!!! Then we have the pig face pork! Omg we mixed it up and it was great! And lastly we had the pork shank. We were stuffed liked a tick! The service was amazing they were constantly giving us water and clean plates. We loved we will be back.
